field.name: body_html
field.div: % set invoice_lines = object.get_objects() % set partner = object.partner_id

${partner.salutation},
% if partner.is_new_donator:
Welcome in the Compassion Donors family! We are glad to send you some information about our organization. Please don't hesitate to contact us if any of your questions about us are left unanswered. It will be an opportunity to know each other better.
% endif
We would like to thank you very much for the following donation you made to Compassion:
% for fund, amount in invoice_lines.get_donations().iteritems():
CHF ${amount}.- for the ${fund}
% endfor
% if object.event_id: % for ambassador in invoice_lines.mapped('user_id').filtered('ambassador_quote'): ${ambassador.ambassador_quote |safe} (Quote from ${ambassador.firstname} ${ambassador.lastname})
% endfor % if object.event_id.thank_you_text: ${object.event_id.thank_you_text |safe} % endif % endif ${object.get_success_story()}
Yours sincerely
